title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 108 - Flag Regulations
content:

State Regulations
§ 108.1 - Definitions
§ 108.2 - Material and size
§ 108.3 - Manner and place of display
§ 108.4 - Care of the flag
§ 108.5 - Pledge to the flag

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 108

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§207, 802; General

Construction Law, §24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
